thread.title: The Best Wedding Dresses From Fall ’16 Bridal Week
thread.title_full: The Best Wedding Dresses From Fall ’16 Bridal Week - Vogue

author: Emily Farra
title: The Best Wedding Dresses From Fall ’16 Bridal Week
text: Bridal trends fluctuate at a different clip than ready-to-wear ones, but the Fall ’16 collections that wrapped earlier this week seemed to mirror fashion’s new romantic mood, from Peter Copping’ s soft ruffles at Oscar de la Renta to Marchesa ’s sensual low-cut backs. Before you say “I do,” click through the slideshow for seven of the bridal collections’ standout gowns, then share your favorite in the comments.
